Package it.polimi.se2018.client.view.gui.controllers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SceneController
    This interface is implemented by the scene controllers of the main fxmls. sub-fxmls, like roundtracker's one, don't implement this interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseNumberSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that is used to ask to the player the value to give to the extract die during the usage of GlazingHammer
    ChoosePlusOrMinusSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that is used when the player has to decide if increase or decrease the value of the die in his hand During the usage of GrozingPliers
    GameSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene of the game
    MatchHandler  
    OneOrTwoDiceSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that is used to ask to the player if he would move one or two dice during the usage of TapWheel
    PlayerNameSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that asks to the player the nickname that he wants to use during the game
    ReconnectionSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that is shown when player reconnects during window selection.
    ScoreBoardSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that shows the final scoreboard of the game just played.
    SelectWindowSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that allows the player to choose his window amongst four
    SetConnectionSceneController
    This is the controller of the starting scene that allows the player to choose connections settings
    WindowSceneController
    This is the controller of the scene that shows the window of the player during the game with buttons
